Name: Cosmopolitan Delight
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with red wine.
Review: No relation to the modern Cosmopolitan , this is a mellow, balanced blend of citrus, brandy and red wine.
History: Adapted from Dale DeGroff 's 2002 book, The Craft of the Cocktail . He, in turn, credits the original recipe to Charlie Paul's 1902 book American and Other Iced Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Cosmopolitan Delight contains 222 calories
Garnish: Orange zest twist (expressed & discarded) and skewered berry fruits
